rows.label: tev075601_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Lyvia about Definians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Lyvia about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0001
rows.name:
After you managed to defeat the three sisters,
we were freed from the voice that was controlling us
and went our separate ways.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0002
rows.name:
Many of the others could be right here in the city!
Of course, they would have taken human forms,
so I doubt you'd ever notice them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0003
rows.name:
I'm sure that after following orders for so long,
some of my sisters must be confused by this sudden
freedom.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0004
rows.name:
But little by little, they too are beginning to realize that
our new lives are better than the ones we used to lead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0008
rows.name:
I hope you understand that I have no intention of losing
you to Eri.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0009
rows.name:
That girl doesn't even seem to understand her own
feelings for you yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0010
rows.name:
But I assure you that once she does challenge me,
I will face her in a fair and honorable challenge
and win the right to make you my own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0011
rows.name:
For now, I am merely devoting myself to learning more
about human beings so that I might better become the
sort of woman who could win your heart.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0012
rows.name: You will not be disappointed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Lyvia about Definians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Lyvia about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0013
rows.name:
After you managed to defeat the three sisters,
we were freed from the voice that was controlling us
and went our separate ways.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0014
rows.name:
Many of the others could be right here in the city!
Of course, they would have taken human forms,
so I doubt you'd ever notice them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0015
rows.name:
I'm sure that after following orders for so long,
some of my siblings must be confused by this sudden
freedom.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0016
rows.name:
But little by little, they too are beginning to realize that
our new lives are better than the ones we used to lead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0020
rows.name:
I hope you understand that I have no intention of losing
you to Eri.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0021
rows.name:
He doesn't even seem to understand his own feelings
for you yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0022
rows.name:
But I assure you that once he does challenge me,
I will face him in a fair and honorable challenge
and win the right to make you my own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0023
rows.name:
For now, I am merely devoting myself to learning more
about human beings so that I might better become the
sort of man who could win your heart. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0024
rows.name: You will not be disappointed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_SEL2011
rows.name: Ask Avi about Definians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Avi about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0025
rows.name:
In the period after you defeated the three sisters,
some of the Definians felt they needed their mother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0026
rows.name:
And, like me, they became closer with her as a
consequence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0027
rows.name:
But our mother burns a little less brightly these days,
you might say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0028
rows.name:
So everyone seems to have gone off to make new
lives for themselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0029
rows.name:
Thanks to you, I have awakened as well.
And now I want to find a way to live a proper life
here in the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0032
rows.name: I'm so sorry! I swear, I'll never do anything bad again![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0033
rows.name:
I won't ever go see my mother again!
In fact, I don't WANT to see her again![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0034
rows.name:
So can you find it in your heart to forgive me?
I'm going to be a good Definian and be of service
to you humans, just like Erio![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0035
rows.name: I want to live here and work hard for New LA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075601_MSG0036
rows.name:
My days of dealing in blood and deceit are over.
I never liked that life. I've never wanted it![ST:wait ]
